feedback.question: What features are most important to you in a digital banking service?
feedback.results: In this survey of members and potential members, the respondents indicated they value several features in a digital banking service. Real-time notifications of transactions and balances, personalized budgeting tools that categorize spending, goal setting and tracking, investment recommendations, and portfolio tacking based on risk tolerance are among the most promising aspects. Additionally, mobile check deposit and remote ATM locator for convenience and biometric login security along with 24/7 customer service for safety and reliability are also important to consumers. Customization and a modern interface to help achieve financial goals were mentioned by a few participants in various subgroups of developers and marketing specialists. Specific help for businesses was your fifth theme combining personalized budgeting down from trackable insights on batch transaction notifications.

feedback.question: How frequently do you use digital banking services?
What would make you switch from your current digital banking provider to our service?
feedback.results: The majority of respondents stated that they would switch to a new digital banking service if it offers them a more personalized and innovative experience. They are particularly interested in receiving personalized insights and tools that help them achieve their financial goals, integrated third-party financial apps, and user-friendly interfaces with excellent customer support. Respondents are also looking for a service that offers competitive prices, better features, and a higher value than what they currently have. Apart from the personalization feature, respondents are also looking for a higher level of convenience, better security features, and more affordable fees. Based on these responses, innovations such as personalized features, comprehensive investment recommendations, third-party financial apps integration, and more accessible, customizable user interfaces will add considerable value to a digital bank's offerings.

feedback.question: On a scale of 1-10, how likely are you to try out our new digital banking service?
What kind of rewards or incentives would encourage you to engage more frequently with our mobile app?
feedback.results: The responses suggest that rewards and incentives are key motivators for engaging frequently with a mobile banking app. Cashback rewards seem to be the most common incentive that members are interested in, along with loyalty points and savings milestones. Other commonly mentioned incentives include personalized financial advice and recommendations and exclusive discounts on financial products or services. Referral programs are also suggested as a way to encourage engagement. In addition, offering personalization and relevance to individual interests and goals may be important in motivating users. Overall, there is a focus on achieving financial stability and success as well as saving money among individuals, particularly entrepreneurs, small business owners, and stay-at-home parents.
